column4: Hi all having a ongoing problem, have gained root access but still wont let me  copy to a external hdd ntfs format. all the permissions seem to be right but it still wont go any ideas
single file ?

sudo cp -r  /path/of/folder    /path/to/folder          ,   checkout sudo fdisk -l before to get correct devicenames

it appears to be mounted, states at bottom /dev/sdb1 on /media/New Volume type fuseblk (ro,nosuid,nodev,allow_other,blksize=4096)
sudo cp -r /dev/path/OrignialFolder  /media/New""Volume/>FlderName<   ,without the <>
